message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its potential value, I believe a starting price of $1,100,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but I believe my initial offer was already quite competitive.  How about we meet in the middle at $1,000,000? This reflects the true value of the product.
I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'd be willing to go up to $950,000, but no higher. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to me.
